languages.text: "Чтите Лорд-капитана, ибо он{mf||а} есть помазанни{mf|к|ца} Императора. Чтите офицеров, ибо они есть посланники воли Лорд-капитана!"
"Honour the Lord Captain, for {mf|he|she} is the Emperor's anointed. Honour the officers, for they are the bearers of the Lord Captain's will!"
languages.original_text: "Чтите Лорд-капитана, ибо он{mf||а} есть помазанни{mf|к|ца} Императора. Чтите офицеров, ибо они есть посланники воли Лорд-капитана!"

traits.locale_text: "Honor the Lord Captain, for {mf|he|she} is the Emperor's anointed. Honor the officers, for they are the bearers of the Lord Captain's will!"
"Honor the Lord Captain, for {mf|he|she} is the Emperor's anointed. Honor the officers, for they are the bearers of the Lord Captain's will!"
"Honor the Lord Captain, for {mf|he|she} is the Emperor's anointed. Honor the officers, for they are the bearers of the Lord Captain's will!"
"Honour the Lord Captain, for {mf|he|she} is the Emperor's anointed. Honour the officers, for they are the bearers of the Lord Captain's will!"

languages.text: “要对领主舰长保持敬畏，因为{mf|他|她}是帝皇的神选者。要对军官保持敬畏，因为他们是领主舰长意志的执行者！”
languages.original_text: "Honour the Lord Captain, for {mf|he|she} is the Emperor's anointed. Honour the officers, for they are the bearers of the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: “要对领主舰长保持敬畏，因为{mf|他|她}是帝皇的神选者。要对军官保持敬畏，因为他们是领主舰长意志的执行者！”

languages.text: «Honren a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador. ¡Honren a los oficiales, portadores de la voluntad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: "Honour the Lord Captain, for {mf|he|she} is the Emperor's anointed. Honour the officers, for they are the bearers of the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: «Honren a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador. ¡Honren a los oficiales, portadores de la voluntad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán!».

languages.text: 「皇帝に聖別されしロード・キャプテンを讃えよ！ロード・キャプテンの意志の担い手たる士官を讃えよ！」
languages.original_text: "Honour the Lord Captain, for {mf|he|she} is the Emperor's anointed. Honour the officers, for they are the bearers of the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝に聖別されしロード・キャプテンを讃えよ！ロード・キャプテンの意志の担い手たる士官を讃えよ！」

languages.text: "Ehrt den Lord Captain, denn {mf|er|sie} wurde vom Imperator gesalbt. Ehret die Offiziere, denn sie tragen den Willen des Lord Captains in die Welt!"
languages.original_text: "Honour the Lord Captain, for {mf|he|she} is the Emperor's anointed. Honour the officers, for they are the bearers of the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: "Ehrt den Lord Captain, denn {mf|er|sie} wurde vom Imperator gesalbt. Ehret die Offiziere, denn sie tragen den Willen des Lord Captains in die Welt!"

languages.text: « Rendez hommage {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, car {mf|il est le représentant consacré|elle est la représentante consacrée} de l'Empereur. Respectez les officiers, car à travers eux s'exprime la volonté {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! »
languages.original_text: "Honour the Lord Captain, for {mf|he|she} is the Emperor's anointed. Honour the officers, for they are the bearers of the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: « Rendez hommage {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, car {mf|il est le représentant consacré|elle est la représentante consacrée} de l'Empereur. Respectez les officiers, car à travers eux s'exprime la volonté {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! »

languages.text: "İmparator'un vekili Lord Kaptan'a hürmet edin. Lord Kaptan'ın sancağını taşıyan subaylara hürmet edin!"
languages.original_text: "Honour the Lord Captain, for {mf|he|she} is the Emperor's anointed. Honour the officers, for they are the bearers of the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un vekili Lord Kaptan'a hürmet edin. Lord Kaptan'ın sancağını taşıyan subaylara hürmet edin!",
